source_organisation_1: City of Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD), 2018 LAPD Crime & Initiatives Report
computation_definitions: The total homicide number includes victims who were assaulted in previous years, but died in 2017, and/or death investigations ruled as homicides in 2017 by the Los Angeles County, Department of Medical Examiner - Coroner.
